page.title: 18Holidays For Herefordians.
page.content: Everybody at some time likes to go on holiday either in{England}or abroad. Of the 30 children in our class, 12 had at least 2 holidays a year, one even going as far as{Zambia.}Eleven children went overseas, the most popular destination being{Spain,}while others went to{France, Greece, Cyprus, {Portugal}and{Ireland. It was surprising that only 7 people stayed in{hotels;}most families preferred{self-catering}holidays. Four took{caravans}and ten rented{cottages or{flats. The most popular region for holidays in{Great Britain}was the South-West. The rest of the class stayed with relatives or enjoyed themselves at {home.}Of course we are lucky that we live in such a very beautiful city, itself a holiday resort.
